alert.note: Alert for St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:39PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Elkhart, northwestern Lagrange and south central St. Joseph Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 138 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlebury, or 8 miles northeast of Goshen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Middlebury around 145 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 96 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
